item.title: Martins [SRL] Alcher Revamped
item.dc:creator: @hey321 hey321
item.description:
@hey321 wrote:

Well, i had about 5 seconds time and i wanted to make more people be able to AFK with Martins alcher so i added in anti-randoms and some anti ban. Behold XD:

[code]{.Script Info:

ScriptName = HighAlcher

Author = MartinW

Description = high alchys =0

Version = 0.0000000000000000000000001b

Date = 32/13/07

Comments = www.moparisthebest.com

/Script Info}
program HighAlchey;
{.include SRL/SRL.scar}
{.include SRL/SRL/skill/magic.scar}

Const
TotalNeeded = 13; //0 for infinite
GoldPer = 1536;
item = ‘Mage Longs’;

var
TotalDone : Integer;

Procedure ChangeReport;
begin
cleardebug;
TotalDone:= TotalDone + 1;
writeln('High Alched ’ + inttostr(TotalDone) + ’ ’ + (Item));
Writeln(‘Made ’ + inttostr(totalDone*GoldPer) + ‘’);
writeln(inttostr(TotalNeeded - TotalDone) + ’ times left’);
end;

procedure NoBan;
begin
AntiBan;
BoredHuman;
RandomMovement;
FindMod;
RotateEvery(10);
FindNormalRandoms;
end;

begin
setupsrl;
repeat
Gametab(7);
NoBan;
fixmage(true);
NoBan;
castspell(31)
NoBan;
MouseItem(16, true)
Wait(Random(20)+2800);
NoBan;
ChangeReport;
Until(TotalDone = TotalNeeded);
logout;
end.[/code]

You see Martin it will take about 200 Milliseconds for it to check for randoms. Also at this every loop it will take not even half a second for randoms. Hows that for good SRL antiban?

Read full topic
